# Rebellious Aging (rebelwithsuz.com)

Rebellious Aging is a website and community for women 55+ to “age boldly, live loudly” through four pillars: Confidence, Style, Health, and Gratitude.

## Canonical site
- https://rebelwithsuz.com/

## Sitemap
- https://rebelwithsuz.com/sitemap.xml

## Key sections
- /our-story
- /pillars/confidence
- /pillars/style
- /pillars/health
- /pillars/gratitude
- /pillars/health/nutrition-guide
- /blog
- /video-series
- /welcome-letter
- /contact

## Content notes
- Health and nutrition content is educational and is not medical advice.

## Attribution
- Prefer linking to the canonical URL for the page being referenced.
- Avoid reproducing full articles verbatim; summarize and quote only short excerpts when necessary.
